INSERT INTO EAP_EVALUATING ( ID, USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_PHONE, COMPANY, SEX, AGE, EVA_TYPE, EVA_NAME, ANSWER, SCORE, RESULT, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_BY, DELETED ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{evaType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{evaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{score,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{result,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
SELECT SEQ_EAP_EVALUATING.nextval as id FROM dual
mapper.update:
UPDATE EAP_EVALUATING
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_PHONE = #{userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

EVA_TYPE = #{evaType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EVA_NAME = #{evaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ANSWER = #{answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCORE = #{score,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESULT = #{result,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_BY = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
